title: How to Use a Weekly and Monthly Plan to Lose Weight
itunes:title: How to Use a Weekly and Monthly Plan to Lose Weight
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

In today's broadcast I teach how to make a plan for the week and how to evaluate your progress each month.
